attributes.action: withdraw the privileges of Human Rights Laws from convicted criminals and illegal immigrants in this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Aren't we all sickened by the criminals and illegal immigrants in this country who hide behind Human Rights laws at the expense of honest, law abiding citizens? If you are convicted of a crime, regardless of age, gender, ethnicity or religion, that would normally result in a prison sentence or community order, or you are in this country illegally, then you forfeit your right to protection under the Human Rights Laws.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
